# MinusPlus

> A fast, privacy-friendly online calculator app with an infinite canvas interface. Type anywhere to calculate, auto-sum columns and rows, works offline.

MinusPlus is a high-performance web calculator that revolutionizes how people do math online. Built with vanilla JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas, it offers an infinite dark canvas where users can click anywhere to start calculating. The app automatically detects and sums vertical columns and horizontal sequences, handles accounting formats, and works completely offline while respecting user privacy.

## Key Features

- **Infinite Canvas Calculator**: Click anywhere on an unlimited workspace to start calculating
- **Auto-Sum Intelligence**: Automatically detects and calculates vertical columns (line-separated) and horizontal sequences (space-separated)
- **Privacy-First**: All data stored locally, no tracking, no external dependencies
- **Offline Capable**: Full functionality without internet connection
- **Accounting Formats**: Supports parentheses for negatives, trailing minus signs, currency symbols
- **High Performance**: 60fps canvas operations, <200ms load time
- **Progressive Web App**: Installable on mobile devices, works like a native app

## Technical Specifications

- **Technology Stack**: Vanilla JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas, Pure CSS
- **Performance**: Sub-200ms load time, 60fps canvas operations
- **Browser Support**: Chrome 80+, Firefox 76+, Safari 13.1+, Edge 80+
- **Mobile**: Touch-optimized with PWA capabilities

## Use Cases

MinusPlus is perfect for:

## Getting Started

1. Visit https://minusplus.app
2. Click anywhere on the dark canvas
3. Start typing numbers
4. Use spaces for horizontal addition, new lines for vertical columns
5. Press Escape to delete a calculation box
6. Use Ctrl+0 to reset the view
